effects.text: A tiny burst of confetti pops from your sleeve. Harmless and festive.
You smell faintly of lemon for 10 minutes. Pleasant but inconsequential.
A polite breeze straightens a nearby person's collar. Purely cosmetic.
Your next spoken sentence echoes once, theatrically.
A small, friendly moth flutters around your shoulder for 1 minute.
Your handwriting briefly writes itself a tiny bit neater for 5 minutes.
A harmless sparkle appears at the tip of your finger when you point for 1 minute.
You briefly gain the urge to hum; a pleasant tune follows you for 10 minutes.
The next coin you toss spins in the air for an extra second before landing; no mechanical effect.
Your shoes squeak melodically for the next minute. Charming, not harmful.
A tiny ribbon appears on the first object handed to you in the next minute.
You exhale a faint shimmer of harmless mist that smells like cinnamon.
Your next short story told aloud becomes slightly more dramatic; roleplay benefit only.
A small, harmless glow highlights the nearest helpful tool for 10 seconds.
A friendly whisper in an unknown language compliments your hat for 1 minute.
Your next sketch gains an extra charming doodle along the margin.
A single harmless bubble appears when you speak loudly; it pops without consequence.
A miniature lantern light hovers near your pack for 1 minute; decorative.
You briefly feel like dancing; your next noncombat movement is especially graceful (flavor).
A tiny wind flips a page of a nearby book to a serendipitous line (DM decides usefulness).
Your next handshake is unusually warm and friendly; roleplay only.
A faint, pleasant scent of pine follows you for 10 minutes.
A tiny harmless star appears over your shoulder for 30 seconds and twinkles.
Your coin purse jingles a cheerful tune for 1 minute; decorative.
You briefly emanate a comforting warmth; allies may find you more reassuring (roleplay).
A polite gust rearranges a loose page of papers into a tidy stack.
A tiny phantom quill writes a friendly note that fades after 1 minute.
The next small snack you eat tastes exceptionally pleasant; purely flavorful.
Your next whispered secret carries a soft echo that makes it sound more mysterious.
A harmless stripe of color appears along your sleeve for 1 hour; cosmetic.
A friendly firefly circles your head once and disappears.
A tiny banner unfurls above you that reads "+1 to Charm" (obviously decorative).
A small patch of grass grows in a fanciful shape where you step for 10 seconds.
You briefly smell like fresh bread; makes you slightly more appealing at bakeries (flavor).
Your next minor repair feels a touch easier; you gain +1 on a single tool check if DM allows (flavor).
A tiny, harmless shadow-play puppet performs on a nearby wall for 20 seconds.
Your next written note decorates itself with tiny glowing margins for 1 minute.
A faint chime sounds when you open a door in the next minute; decorative only.
A small, friendly breeze tidies one tabletop within 5 feet; purely cosmetic.
Your laughter for the next minute produces harmless glitter that drifts away.
A single harmless spark forms into a smile above a nearby puddle and fades.
A tiny, polite trumpet fanfare sounds when you stand up in the next minute; theatrical, not loud.
A harmless soap bubble appears in your hand and floats away, bursting softly.
Your next small sewing or mending task gains a subtle flourish; cosmetic.
A cozy warmth spreads through your pockets for 1 minute; purely flavorful.
A tiny helper bird straightens a nearby hat for you; decorative.
Your next short song sounds just a bit fuller; roleplay advantage to Performance if DM allows.
A harmless scent of lavender follows your next conversation for 5 minutes.
A little note appears on your forearm that reads "You are appreciated" for 10 minutes.
A tiny, harmless glow outlines the nearest useful tool for 10 seconds.
A faint, friendly echo repeats the last thing you said once.
A small, harmless puff of snow falls in a 3-foot radius around you and melts immediately.
A single harmless sparkle appears at the edge of your vision for 1 minute.
Your next small joke lands particularly well; roleplay only.
A tiny, decorative ribbon ties itself on the nearest chair for 1 minute.
A tiny, phantom cat naps on your pack for 1 minute; purely cosmetic.
You exhale tiny harmless bubbles that pop with a soft musical note.
A small, polite wind rearranges a scattered stack of papers into a neat pile.
Your next small act of kindness feels especially heartfelt; roleplay boost only.
A faint trail of harmless stars follows your next step for 5 seconds.
A tiny lantern light floats beside you for 1 minute; decorative.
Your next handwriting sample is particularly legible; flavor only.
A small, harmless tune plays when you open a book for 30 seconds.
You briefly smell like freshly cut grass; pleasant and inconsequential.
A tiny phantom loaf appears and crumbles into harmless crumbs after 10 seconds; decorative.
Your next small coin flip lands showing a tiny smiling face; decorative only.
A harmless sparkle outlines the nearest useful map for 10 seconds.
A single tiny feather floats down and lands on your shoulder then vanishes.
A faint, pleasing scent of apples follows you for 10 minutes.
A miniature rainbow arcs over your head for 15 seconds; purely cosmetic.
A tiny, friendly sprite straightens a nearby picture on a wall for 10 seconds.
Your next short conversation feels more memorable; roleplay only.
A gentle chime sounds when you place an object down in the next minute; decorative.
A tiny, harmless paw print appears where you step for 10 seconds; decorative.
Your next small baked item you make tastes exceptionally good; flavor only.
A small, harmless shimmer outlines the nearest door handle for 10 seconds.
A tiny paper crane folds itself and flutters away; purely decorative.
A harmless bell rings softly when you laugh for the next minute.
A small, polite ghost politely applauds when you finish speaking; decorative.
Your next short song has a tiny echo that makes it sound fuller; roleplay only.
The next creature to hand you an object will find it wrapped in a tiny ribbon (harmless cosmetic) for 1 minute.
You speak in a slightly older dialect for 10 minutes; flavor only.
A small pile of colorful leaves appears at your feet and rustles pleasantly for 1 minute.
Your pouch jingles the tune of your homeland for 10 minutes; decorative.
Tiny stars dance across your forearm for 1 minute; purely cosmetic.
A small, harmless projection of your face does a silly expression for 10 seconds; purely cosmetic.
Your next quickly-taken note is decorated with tiny glowing margins for 1 minute.
A polite gust rearranges a nearby person's collar into a flattering angle; roleplay only.
You exhale a puff of harmless lantern light that brightens a 5-foot area for 1 minute; extinguishes easily.
Your next small sewing or mending task feels easier; decorative bonus if DM allows.
A faint, friendly jingling follows your footsteps for 10 minutes; decorative.
Your next whispered secret carries a little echo and sounds more dramatic; no mechanical effect.
You briefly exhale tiny bubbles that smell like mint; they pop harmlessly.
A small, harmless phantom squirrel appears and fetches a nearby shiny trinket (DM discretion) for 1 minute.
A single harmless spark pops from your mouth when you speak loudly for 1 minute; no damage.
Your next step on stone causes a tiny decorative crack of light to bloom and fade; decorative.
A little note floats out of your sleeve and writes a compliment to you, then vanishes after 1 minute.
For 1 minute, your laughter causes small harmless blossoms to appear where you step.
You taste a memory of seaside picnics; purely flavorful and pleasant.
A harmless glow highlights the nearest useful item for 10 seconds (DM determines usefulness).
Your next loaf of bread tastes especially good; flavor only.
A tiny phantom cat naps on your pack for 1 minute; purely cosmetic.
You can murmur to small birds for 10 minutes; they respond with chirps (flavor).
A friendly invisible hand straightens one small item within reach for 1 minute; decorative.
You gain a faint scent of vanilla for 10 minutes; pleasant but inconsequential.
A small, harmless sparkle appears each time you blink for 1 minute; cosmetic.
A polite drumbeat follows you for 10 seconds when you make a dramatic exit; decorative.
Your next simple tool use feels slightly easier; flavor only if DM permits.
A tiny glimmering path lights up for 5 feet where you step for 10 seconds; decorative.
You briefly smell like rain for 10 minutes; pleasant and flavorful.
A tiny friendly echo repeats your last sentence once for 1 minute; purely cosmetic.
You produce a single harmless soap bubble that floats nearby for 1 minute; decorative.
Your next attempt to recall a face feels easier; roleplay boost only.
A small, harmless gust flips a lock of hair into your eyes dramatically for 1 minute; cosmetic.
Your next written note decorates itself with tiny, irrelevant doodles that are charming.
You briefly emanate the scent of fresh cookies for 10 minutes; purely flavorful.
A harmless sparkly trail fades behind your next thrown noncombat item for 1 minute; decorative.
A small, polite trumpet fanfare sounds when you stand up for 10 seconds; decorative.
You temporarily have faint glowing tattoos on your arms for 1 hour; purely cosmetic.
A friendly, tiny wind tickles a nearby creature's nose causing them to sneeze once (harmless).
Your next minor repair is slightly easier; flavor bonus only if DM allows.
A harmless golden coin appears in your hand and turns into dust after 1 minute; decorative.
A soft, tiny harp chord sounds when you look at a painting for 1 minute; decorative.
Your voice briefly takes on the timbre of a bard for 1 minute; roleplay only.
A small, friendly ghost cat appears and follows you for 1 minute; harmless.
For 1 minute your pockets feel slightly warmer; purely flavorful.
You gain a tiny, translucent map that shows only your immediate surroundings for 1 minute; decorative.
A faint aroma of spice wafts from your hands for 10 minutes; decorative.
A harmless little spark pops as you swing a weapon once in the next minute; decorative.
Your next short spoken story becomes more lively; roleplay only.
A tiny pair of wings appear on your shoes for 1 minute and flap adorably; no flight benefit.
A harmless glitter ring appears briefly at your feet when you cast a spell for 1 minute; decorative.
A small pigeon delivers a flattering note to you within 1 minute (DM roleplay).
A miniature rainbow arches over your head for 1 minute; purely decorative.
You temporarily speak with a slight accent of an obscure region for 1 hour; roleplay only.
A single harmless star flits across the sky above you and twinkles once; decorative.
A tiny music box pops out of your pack and plays a tune for 1 minute; decorative.
The next nonmagical trinket you pick up sparkles faintly for 1 minute; decorative.
Your next handshake feels unusually warm and friendly; roleplay only.
A gentle gust rearranges a nearby person's hair into a humorous style for 1 minute; decorative.
A tiny, harmless constellation appears on your palm for 1 hour; decorative.
A small, polite chime plays when you open a door for the next minute; decorative.
One small object in your pocket becomes covered in harmless, fragrant powder for 1 hour; decorative.
A tiny, helpful breeze turns a small page of a book to the page you meant to read (DM determines usefulness).
A faint, friendly glow outlines your boots for 1 minute; decorative.
Your next spoken nickname for an ally sounds particularly affectionate; roleplay only.
A small drifting lantern appears beside you for 1 minute and moves with you; decorative.
For 1 minute, your footsteps leave small, harmless footprints of a random tiny creature; decorative.
A tiny, harmless shower of rose petals appears and drifts down for 1 minute; decorative.
Your next short story told aloud becomes more dramatic; roleplay only.
A small, harmless illusion of a dancing shoe appears and dances for 10 seconds; decorative.
Your next attempt to impress a craftsperson is met with slight admiration; flavor only.
A polite gust rearranges a scattered set of papers into a tidy pile within 5 feet; decorative.
A tiny, friendly glow follows your fingers as you write for 1 minute; not bright enough to affect stealth.
Your next small fire you start glows a pleasing color for 1 hour; decorative.
A harmless little bell rings once when you set down an object in the next minute; decorative.
A tiny, invisible perfume cloud follows you for 10 minutes; decorative.
Your next spoken compliment is especially memorable; roleplay only.
A small, harmless puff of snow falls in a 3-foot radius around you for 1 minute; it melts immediately.
A tiny, friendly balloon appears and stays tied to your belt for 1 minute; decorative.
Your next noncombat dance is particularly graceful; roleplay only.
You and your nearest ally within 5 feet swap one minor, purely cosmetic accessory (hat, scarf) for 10 minutes.
A tiny, harmless sparkle follows any food you eat for 1 minute; decorative.
A small, polite owl hoots once in agreement with something you said; decorative.
You briefly smell delightful; purely flavorful.
A faint, friendly shimmer outlines one piece of clothing for 10 minutes; decorative.
A tiny magical spark fizzles from your fingertips when you gesture for 1 minute; decorative.
A harmless little star appears and points toward the nearest source of warmth for 1 minute; decorative.
You briefly taste of exotic spices; purely flavorful.
A single harmless firework pops gently overhead and fades immediately; decorative.
A tiny, friendly breeze plays a short tune on a nearby wind chime for 10 seconds; decorative.
Your next small joke lands especially well; roleplay only.
A harmless blue glow outlines your fingertips for 1 minute; decorative.
A tiny, polite bell appears on your ankle and rings softly for 1 minute; decorative.
You briefly hear a chorus of distant frogs singing for 10 seconds; decorative.
A small, harmless puff of glitter outlines the next letter you write for 1 minute; decorative.
A tiny, friendly firefly circles your head and gives a little salute for 1 minute; decorative.
Your next spoken word sounds slightly more charismatic; roleplay only.
You momentarily smell of pine; decorative and pleasant.
A harmless silver thread appears and ties a neat bow around your waist for 1 minute; decorative.
You gain a tiny, harmless tattoo that fades in 1 hour; decorative.
Your next small drawing animates for 10 seconds; decorative.
A helpful, whispering breeze points toward the nearest exit for 10 seconds; DM determines usefulness.
A tiny, friendly sparrow delivers a crumb to you and hops away; decorative.
A soft, pleasant chime plays when you take a step for 1 minute; decorative.
You briefly feel like a celebrated performer; roleplay only.
A harmless little crown of light appears over your head and wobbles for 10 seconds; decorative.
Your next small spoken rumor sounds particularly believable; roleplay only.
Tiny harmless sparks dance across a nearby puddle for 1 minute; decorative.
A little bell rings when you open a chest within 1 minute; decorative.
Your next small spoken compliment is especially charming; roleplay only.
A polite gust refolds a page in a book to the right paragraph for 10 seconds; decorative.
A tiny, harmless halo hovers over one ally within 10 feet for 1 minute; decorative.
Your next glance at a map makes one route seem clearer; roleplay only.
A tiny friendly spark reveals the nearest signpost's direction for 10 seconds; decorative.
You briefly smell of fresh ink; decorative and flavor-only.
A small, harmless firefly lands on your finger and blinks for 1 minute; decorative.
A soft, tiny drumroll accompanies your next short speech; decorative.
A harmless sparkle forms the shape of a smile near you for 1 minute; decorative.
A tiny gust rearranges embroidery on one nearby garment for 1 minute; decorative improvement.
You gain 1 temporary hit point that lasts 1 minute.
A small, harmless mote of light dances over your left shoulder for 1 minute.
You feel unusually well-rested for 10 minutes; flavor-only energy boost.
Your next short rest feels a touch more restorative; flavor only.
A tiny, friendly echo applauds when you finish speaking for 10 seconds.
A soft breeze cools you pleasantly for the next 10 minutes.
Your next simple joke is particularly witty; roleplay only.
A harmless sparkle decorates the nearest nonmagical trinket you hold for 1 minute; decorative.
A tiny, polite crowd noise plays when you enter a room for 5 seconds; decorative.
A single harmless feather drifts down and tickles your nose; decorative.
The next small gift you give seems especially well-received; roleplay only.
A tiny, glowing arrow points to the nearest bench or chair for 10 seconds; decorative.
You briefly gain a pleasing hum that makes simple tasks feel calmer; flavor only.
A small cluster of harmless lights hovers near you for 1 minute; decorative.
A tiny, friendly voice offers a compliment to you and then fades; decorative.
You emit a faint pleasant scent for 10 minutes; decorative and flavorful.
A single harmless note rings out when you open a bottle; decorative.
Your next seam or stitch holds a little better; flavor only.
A small paper lantern floats near you for 30 seconds then vanishes; decorative.
A tiny, harmless gust rustles nearby curtains in a pleasing way for 10 seconds.
A delightful but harmless aroma of cookies follows you for 10 minutes.
A tiny bell chimes softly when you begin a sentence for the next minute; decorative.
A small, harmless bloom appears on the nearest potted plant for 1 minute.
Your next short poem reads particularly well; roleplay only.
A tiny, friendly ghost offers a thumbs-up and gently vanishes; decorative.
A small, pleasant breeze follows you for 5 minutes; decorative.
Your next found trinket seems a touch more interesting; DM discretion.
A faint shimmer outlines the nearest book for 10 seconds; decorative.
A tiny, harmless puddle forms a smiling face for 5 seconds and disappears.
Your next handshake leaves a faint, pleasant scent of lavender; decorative.
You gain 1 temporary hit point that lasts 1 minute.
A small harmless glowing mote hovers near your shoulder for 1 minute.
You briefly feel sprightly and alert for 10 minutes; purely flavorful.
A tiny musical flourish accompanies your next flourish of magic (cosmetic).
A small, friendly gust cools a hot cup of tea for you; decorative.
A faint trail of sparkles leads to the nearest useful object for 10 seconds; decorative.
Your next minor culinary attempt tastes just a bit better; flavor only.
A tiny note appears in your pocket that simply says "Well done" for 1 hour; decorative.
A polite gust turns a single page to the page you meant to read; DM discretion.
A single harmless sparkle outlines the nearest useful tool for 10 seconds; decorative.
Your next short spoken story becomes more vivid; roleplay only.
A tiny harmless songbird perches nearby and trills for 10 seconds; decorative.
A small, friendly shadow forms a tiny heart for 10 seconds and fades.
A faint pleasant scent of citrus follows you for 10 minutes; decorative.
A tiny piece of confetti lands on your hat and stays for 1 minute; decorative.
Your next small craft project feels slightly more satisfying; flavor only.
A friendly whisper of encouragement brushes past you for 10 seconds; decorative.
A tiny harmless glow marks the nearest exit for 10 seconds; decorative.
A small harmless ribbon ties itself on the nearest gift for 1 minute; decorative.
A tiny friendly tune plays when you put down an object for 5 seconds; decorative.
A polite breeze flips a page to reveal a reassuring quote (DM discretion).
A tiny harmless glow outlines the nearest keyhole for 10 seconds; decorative.
A single harmless bubble forms and floats away when you laugh; decorative.
A faint, pleasant hum follows your next sentence for 10 seconds; decorative.
A small, harmless light dances on your fingertips for 1 minute; decorative.
A tiny friendly breeze carries the scent of distant flowers for 10 minutes; decorative.
Your next small repair seems to hold a little better; flavor only.
A tiny harmless sparkle briefly highlights the nearest helpful signpost for 10 seconds.
A polite chime sounds when you step into a room for the next 5 seconds; decorative.
A small harmless feather floats by and settles on your sleeve, then vanishes.
You gain 1 temporary hit point that lasts 1 minute.
A tiny decorative moth flutters around your lantern for 1 minute; decorative.
A small burst of harmless colored sparkles appears when you clap; decorative.
Your next short phrase sounds particularly memorable; roleplay only.
A tiny friendly glow follows your pen when you write for 1 minute; decorative.
A small playful breeze tousles your hair charmingly for 10 seconds; decorative.
A miniature paper hat appears on a nearby inanimate object for 1 minute; decorative.
A tiny harmless sparkle outlines the nearest helpful shelf for 10 seconds; decorative.
A small, pleasant scent of herbs wafts from your satchel for 10 minutes; decorative.
A tiny, friendly cheep from an unseen bird acknowledges you for 5 seconds; decorative.
A faint shimmer outlines the nearest path for 5 seconds; decorative.
Your next small toast is particularly well-received; roleplay only.
A tiny harmless spark forms a smile on the nearest smooth surface for 5 seconds.
A little confetti puff appears when you nod and then drifts away; decorative.
Your next small craft looks a touch more polished; flavor only.
A tiny harmless glow marks the nearest helpful lever for 10 seconds; decorative.
A small, polite bell rings softly when you say someone's name for the next minute; decorative.
A tiny, friendly hush falls over nearby chatter for 3 seconds when you begin to tell a story; decorative.
A single harmless bubble pops with a soft musical note when you speak; decorative.
A small harmless sparkle forms a heart shape in the air for 5 seconds; decorative.
A tiny note appears on your palm that says "Good luck" and fades in 10 seconds; decorative.
A fleeting shadow puppetry scene plays on a nearby wall for 10 seconds; decorative.
A tiny harmless echo of laughter follows you for 10 seconds after you laugh; decorative.
A small, warm glow outlines the nearest comfortable chair for 10 seconds; decorative.
A tiny harmless sprite brushes lint off your sleeve and vanishes; decorative.
A single harmless star twinkles over your head for 5 seconds and disappears.
A faint pleasant scent of vanilla follows you for 10 minutes; decorative.
A tiny harmless bell rings once when you complete a sentence; decorative.
A small decorative ribbon appears on your belt for 1 minute and then vanishes.
A tiny, harmless sparkle appears on the nearest lamp for 10 seconds; decorative.
You cast Fireball (3rd-level) centered on a point you can see within 150 feet; it requires no components or spell slot.
You cast Lightning Bolt (3rd-level) in a 100-foot line you choose; it requires no components or spell slot.
You gain one extra action this turn. This action can be used to take the Attack (one weapon attack), Dash, Disengage, Hide, Use an Object, or cast a cantrip.
Allies you choose within 30 feet immediately regain hit points equal to their hit point maximum (they are healed to full).
Until the start of your next turn, you have resistance to all damage and advantage on saving throws.
Your next attack or spell that deals damage before the end of your next turn deals maximum damage.
As a bonus action this turn, you can teleport to any unoccupied space you can see within 120 feet.
A spectral guardian shields your group for 1 minute; as a reaction (once per round), it imposes disadvantage on one attack against you or an ally within 10 feet.
You gain a 60-foot flying speed for 1 minute.
You immediately regain all expended spell slots of 3rd level and lower.
